definition: to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: The Ping-Pong tables, soda machines, and lots of music.
sentences.chinese: 乒乓球，汽水販賣機，熱鬧的音樂。

sentences.english: You know the exact time the vending machines are refilled.
sentences.chinese: 你很清楚飲料販賣機什麼時候會補貨。

sentences.english: Change can be found in pockets and under your machines.
sentences.chinese: 你有可能在投幣式自動販賣機的附近發現零錢。

sentences.english: Excuse me, where is the coke machine?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，飲料販賣機在哪裏？

sentences.english: The Olympic vending machines 'are just the first step, ' says Mr. Lo.
sentences.chinese: 放置奧運自動販賣機“只是第一步”。

sentences.english: But a vending machine can do that, too.
sentences.chinese: 但是自動販賣機也能做到。

sentences.english: The decor and in-room vending machines were unusual, to say the least. ?
sentences.chinese: 但是裏面的裝飾和室內自動販賣機確實非同尋常。

sentences.english: Vending machines and restaurants at water parks can be very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 水上公園的自動販賣機和飯店價位比較貴。

sentences.english: Well, you can buy some from that vending machine over there.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你可以到那邊的販賣機去買。
自動販賣機式的圖書館。

sentences.english: The Olympic vending machines 'are just the 1st step, ' says Mr.
sentences.chinese: 放置奧運自動販賣機“只是第一步”。

sentences.english: I need change for the cigarette machine.
sentences.chinese: 我需要投香菸販賣機的零錢。

sentences.english: Why not create a working beer dispenser with a computer chassis.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼做一個工作用電腦啤酒販賣機。

sentences.english: We couldn't use the soft drink machine because it was out of order.
sentences.chinese: 我們無法使用這臺清涼飲料販賣機，因爲它故障了。

sentences.english: Gold prices from the machines, named Gold To Go (see photo), are about 30% higher than market prices.
sentences.chinese: 販賣機裏的黃金價格比市場價高出30%。

sentences.english: The vending machine has been being on the fritz.
sentences.chinese: 這個自動販賣機一直都有問題。

definition: domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
to eat in (at a restaurant) (Tw)/to take the medicine orally
